title: Legal/Illegal Bankruptcy
keywords: bankruptcy reorganization bankrupt no more pensions retirement bankrupt too illegal personal finance financial money debt debts regrets airline aviation industry industries retirement funds retirement fund retirement funding liability liabilities United Airlines pilot United Airlines pilots Cartoonist Group Creators Syndicate Akron Beacon-Journal
caption: I regret to inform you that under terms of the United Airlines bankruptcy reorganization, your pension is no more.  That means I'll go bankrupt too.  I'm afraid that's illegal.
